creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: red and yellow fibers woven around circular band; six brush-like red-orange elements; two tassel-like ornaments with red-orange and black hair, front and back; one large "tassel" has longer black hairs
dimension: 3 3/16 x 9 3/4 x 9 3/4 in. (8.1 x 24.77 x 24.77 cm) (including "tassels")
title: Woman's head band
